sk1.name: Shuriken Toss
sk1.desc: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.

sk2.name: Jinada
sk2.desc: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.

sk3.name: Shadow Walk
sk3.desc: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability. If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.

sk4.name: Track
sk4.desc: Tracks an enemy hero, giving True Sight of it and grants a gain in movement speed to allies near the hunted. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bounty in gold.
